name: unwomanly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not showing the qualities, ideas, or physical features that a woman is typically or traditionally thought to have, or expected to have: In the last century, taking part in martial arts was thought of as unwomanly. Opposite
womanly
More examplesFewer examplesHe complained that it was unwomanly that she never showed him any sympathy when he was ill.Women who took an interest in politics were regarded as dangerous and unwomanly.She sat cross-legged in what was then considered a very unwomanly pose.
